targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "hits" WHERE "loctag" =~ /^$loctag$/ AND "name" =~ /^$name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "status" WHERE "loctag" =~ /^$loctag$/ AND "name" =~ /^$name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND "status" = '200' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "status" WHERE "loctag" =~ /^$loctag$/ AND "name" =~ /^$name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND "status" = '403' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "status" WHERE "loctag" =~ /^$loctag$/ AND "name" =~ /^$name$/  AND "protocol" =~ /^$protocol$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND "status" <> '403' AND "status" <> '200' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") /60 FROM "status" WHERE "status" =~ /^200$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("value") /60 FROM "status" WHERE "status" =~ /^200$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "upstreams_status" WHERE "vhost" = 'musicbrainz.org' AND "status" = '200' AND "upstream" =~ /:65405$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "upstream" fill(none)

panels.title: Server contacted / internal redirect per upstream hit

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") /60 FROM "upstreams_status" WHERE "vhost" = 'musicbrainz.org' AND "status" = '200' AND "upstream" =~ /:65412$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "upstream" fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") /60 FROM "upstreams_status" WHERE "vhost" = 'musicbrainz.org' AND "status" = '200' AND "upstream" =~ /:65412$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "upstream" fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") /60 FROM "upstreams_status" WHERE "vhost" = 'musicbrainz.org' AND "status" = '200' AND "upstream" =~ /:65412$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "upstream" fill(none)

list.name: name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hits" WITH KEY = "name"

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hits" WITH KEY = "loctag"

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hits" WITH KEY = "vhost"
